Summary I am enthusiastically focused on my advertiser’s success and building strong client relationships, while striving to achieve our business goals. 
 
I have spent the last 13 years immersed in online advertising both at the Local and National level. I have achieved success at several of the world’s most reputable internet companies including Yahoo, IAC, and Monster Worldwide. I am an experienced Account Manager, representing national brands such as eBay, Mitsubishi, Fandango, McDonald’s, Marriott Hotels, GEICO, University of Phoenix, Discount/America’s Tire, etc., both through direct relationships and at the Agency level.  
 
I am seeking an opportunity to build and maintain deep partnerships with high value clients, while utilizing my strong up-selling and cross-selling skills in order to achieve individual and team revenue goals. Experience Account Manager Yahoo! July 2013  – Present (2 years 2 months) Burbank, CA As an Account Manager representing the Autos vertical at Yahoo, I currently support premium accounts with a focus on Search, Native, and Mobile advertising. 
 
My book of business consists of approximately 125 clients who represent over 1,400 accounts, with an aggregate annual spend of approximately $36M. 
 
I am responsible for building and maintaining client relationships with all levels of staff (CEOs, Marketing Directors, and Account Managers, etc.) through daily interaction, weekly conference calls, in person meetings, and online presentations. 
 
I currently support both Direct advertisers as well as Agencies who represent brands such as Mitsubishi, ARCO, Exxon, and many other E-commerce sites within the Autos vertical. 
 
I proactively create strategic recommendations and implement Search Marketing solutions (mobile & native included) for my clients by maintaining a deep understanding of their marketing goals, media buying cycles, strategy, etc. 
 National Account Manager CityGrid Media February 2009  –  July 2013  (4 years 6 months) West Hollywood, CA National Sales Team - CityGrid Media 
 
I am responsible for supporting existing relationships within the interactive agencies environment with a focus on National, Local focused clients. My day-to-day activities include fostering a strong partnership with our clients, up-selling existing advertisers, cross-selling sponsorship packages and providing daily support to achieve revenue and customer retention goals. I analyze our client’s ROI goals and data, media buying cycles, marketing philosophy, target demographics, etc. 
 
I am enthusiastically focused on our advertiser’s success and building strong client relationships, while striving to achieve our business goals. Enterprise Account Manager Monster December 2007  –  December 2008  (1 year 1 month) Los Angeles, CA Field Sales - National Accounts 
 
While at Monster I managed a book of business that consisted of approximately 35 Enterprise accounts (ex. California Pizza Kitchen, Mercury Insurance Group, Guitar Center, Ingram Micro, Coffee Bean and Tea Leaf, etc.). I worked closely with Monster’s Media, Diversity, and Technical Solutions partners to upsell clients into new and existing products within those channels. My primary focus was to build and maintain strong client relationships by engaging in face-to-face meetings to review activity, address current needs, and work through my client’s sales cycle with the goal of annual contract renewals. Account Manager, Agency Services Team Yahoo! Search Marketing September 2002  –  December 2007  (5 years 4 months) While at Yahoo!, I managed a book of businesses with an aggregate quarterly spend of approximately $8 MM comprising over 50 high-need online and traditional agencies and Search Engine Marketers.  
 
I achieved a 10% lift in revenue across accounts on a quarterly basis. 
 
Analyzed client ROI/CPA goals and campaign data, media buying cycles, site architecture, product/service update schedules, marketing philosophy and target demographics in order to maximize client return. 
 
Created and implemented custom pay per click campaign strategies for each agency via a deep knowledge of Yahoo Search Marketing products. 
 
Built and maintained relationships with all levels of agency staff (CEOs, Marketing Directors, and Account Managers). 
 
Drove revenue growth via account expansion, spend cap increases, and feature adoption. 
 
Worked with internal teams at Yahoo!, including the Emerging Markets team to sell clients into beta products. 
 
Maintained a thorough knowledge and understanding of all internal systems to respond to general and specialized client requests; including invoicing/billing inquiries, click fraud inquiries, bidding requests and policy and guideline compliance issues. The Account Manager serves as the primary contact for all SB Nation clients during the pre and post-sale stages and is responsible for maintaining customer satisfaction. As the internal liaison between tech, editorial and post sales, the Account Manager is expected to consistently provide excellent customer service to accounts. In addition, the Account Manager will work closely with the sales team to actively engage in the growth of existing and new business opportunities. This position is at the crux of representing client needs and goals within the organization to ensure quality delivery and to help drive results with SB Nation.  
 
Responsibilities 
- Coordinate inbound RFP process with the help of the Sales Manager, Ad Ops, and Sales Dev to create all materials (ppt, excel, etc) needed for complete response to all inbound and proactive proposals.  
- Manage clients and lead campaigns once IO is in house.  
-Assist the Sales Manager and internal teams to develop a list of deliverables, schedules and success metrics to ensure campaign goals are met. 
- Serve as the primary Point Person in client communication on pending and live campaigns. 
-Communicate and follow up with client and internal departments regarding live campaigns to address any concerns.  
- Assist production team in client communications on timelines, approvals, and deliverables and maintain internal process.  
- Produce weekly delivery report for live campaigns and work with Sales Manager if optimizations are needed.  
- Review monthly Revenue Sheet to ensure all placements have properly delivered per the IO and revenue has been appropriately recognized.  
-Construct delivery reports for Finance to bill off of and alert finance of any billing issues to be resolved.

Summary Scott Kane is now a Marketing and Advertising Sourcing Specialist at the Walt Disney Company. Previously, he held digital marketing account management roles at Yahoo! Inc. Adaptable and comfortable with ambiguity, he possess an intricate understanding of digital media and marketing on a global scale and has thrived in dynamic high-pressure business environments where an intricate level of understanding of retail and e-commerce KPIs was essential. Ever an international manager of mystery: danger and detail are his middle names and he has lived and worked abroad in China where he became conversationally fluent in Mandarin Chinese. Native Ads, Product Listing Ads, and Yahoo! Ad Manager.
